Source.Name: materia-gtk-theme
Source.Summary: A Material Design-like theme for GNOME/GTK+ based desktop environments
Source.Description:
Materia (formerly Flat-Plat) is a Material Design theme for GNOME/GTK+ based desktop environments.
It supports GTK+ 3, GTK+ 2, GNOME Shell, Budgie, MATE, LightDM, GDM, Chrome theme, etc.
